title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not set correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the IDE and create a project.
2. Right-click on the desired parent class in the project explorer and select 'New' > 'Class'.
3. In the 'New Class' dialog, enter a name for the nested class and click 'Finish'.
4. Open the created nested class file and observe the context setting.
